channel.title: AI on Bogdan Penkovsky, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Bogdan Penkovsky, PhD

item.title: Energy-efficient AI
item.description: We aim at bringing AI from data centers to the edge. Lower energy consumption will improve battery-powered devices autonomy. Moreover, no need for data transfer over the network will ultimately enhance privacy and provide better data security. To help you getting familiar with the subject, here is an introductory post on binarized neural networks.

item.title: HMEP
item.description: Multi Expression Programming is a genetic programming variant encoding multiple solutions in the same chromosome. Essentially, a chromosome is a computer program consisting of reusable subprograms. The remarkable thing about MEP algorithms is that they are programs actually writing programs.
